name: The Bunker (itch) (fabioecco, FaDiMak, henkehedstrom)
description:
We have to fight hordes of shadow monsters.

Movements: WASD

Shoot: Space

Buy Upgrade(although it doesn't change anything except you loose some light): E

Fabio: Art primarily but also programming.

Henrik: Programming primarily, gave ideas for fabios art, Main Menu, soundeffects, fixing Fadi's code.

Fadi: Programming primarily,design, music (which is currently not in the game), rigging up the animations.

Disclaimer: This was our  first  Gamejam. It is not perfect but upcoming games is probably going to be better.
